about_the_game:
Halloween Trouble 6: Pumpkin Rampage is a spooky Match-3 puzzle that follows the adventures of the witch, Ronida. When a magical battle with a wizard goes awry, it causes the magic creatures of the swamp to run amok, threatening the peaceful town of Jamberton! 

Follow the witch as she chases one adventure after another, Enjoy the varied Match-3 levels as you visit different locations. Play minigames such as Jigsaw, Sliders, Solitaire, and Hidden object. Take quests from the residents of Jamberton and solve them as you enjoy the Halloween themed artwork and music.

Can you help Ronida stop the pumpkin rampage and save Jamberton?

Features

  • 100 challenging Match-3 levels

  • Variety of minigames: Jigsaw, Slider, Solitaire, and Hidden Object

  • Engaging storyline with colorful characters

  • Customizable gameplay options

  • Beautifully crafted Halloween-themed visuals

  • Collector's Edition includes bonus campaign with 61 extra levels
detailed_description:
Halloween Trouble 6: Pumpkin Rampage is a spooky Match-3 puzzle that follows the adventures of the witch, Ronida. When a magical battle with a wizard goes awry, it causes the magic creatures of the swamp to run amok, threatening the peaceful town of Jamberton! 

Follow the witch as she chases one adventure after another, Enjoy the varied Match-3 levels as you visit different locations. Play minigames such as Jigsaw, Sliders, Solitaire, and Hidden object. Take quests from the residents of Jamberton and solve them as you enjoy the Halloween themed artwork and music.

Can you help Ronida stop the pumpkin rampage and save Jamberton?

Features

  • 100 challenging Match-3 levels

  • Variety of minigames: Jigsaw, Slider, Solitaire, and Hidden Object

  • Engaging storyline with colorful characters

  • Customizable gameplay options

  • Beautifully crafted Halloween-themed visuals

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 3Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • Sound Card: Any
